<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2061</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Field Trips in the Israeli High School Geology Curriculum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fangen Sie Reisen im israelischen High 
School Geologie-Lehrplan auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyages de zone dans le programme d'études 
israélien de géologie de lycée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desengates de campo no curriculum israeli da 
geologia da High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viaggi di campo nel programma di studi israeliano
di geologia della High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδια πεδίων στο ισραηλινό πρόγραμμα σπουδών 
γεωλογίας γυμνασίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Disparos al campo en el plan de estudios israelí
de la geología de la High School secundaria</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article discusses and outlines the development of the High School Geology Curriculum and the part played by field trips in the curriculum</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">field trips</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">curriculum</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel behandelt und umreißt die 
Entwicklung des High School Geologie-Lehrplans und die Rolle, die 
vorbei gespielt wird, fangen Reisen im Lehrplan auf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article discute et trace les grandes lignes 
du développement du programme d'études de géologie de lycée et du 
rôle joués par des voyages de zone dans le programme d'études</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo discute e esboça o desenvolvimento 
do curriculum da geologia da High School e da parte feitos por 
desengates de campo no curriculum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo discute e descrive lo sviluppo 
del programma di studi di geologia della High School e della parte 
fatti dai viaggi di campo nel programma di studi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο συζητά και περιγράφει την ανάπτυξη του 
προγράμματος σπουδών γεωλογίας γυμνασίου και του ρόού που 
παίζονται από τα ταξίδια πεδίων στο πρόγραμμα σπουδών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo discute y contornea el desarrollo 
del plan de estudios de la geología de la High School secundaria y de
la parte hechos por disparos al campo en el plan de estudios</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Reisen auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voyages de zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">programme d'études</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desengates de campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">curriculum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">viaggi di campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
